document_info.title: Angelicalist's Extraction Journey - From Tea to Straight Up Eating It
document_info.author: Angelicalist
document_info.purpose: First-hand experimental findings on mimosa extraction and consumption methods

learning_progression.summary: Journey from complex extraction attempts to discovering simplest effective method
learning_progression.key_insight: Extraction takes TIME - complexity doesn't equal effectiveness
learning_progression.final_discovery: Simplest method (no extraction) works best for oral consumption

experiment_1_purple_tea.title: Initial Tea Attempt
experiment_1_purple_tea.method: Heated MHRB with water and lemon juice for about 1 hour
problems: Didn't have time for full boil-down and re-extract cycles
Thought lemon juice would speed up extraction - it doesn't work that way
Tea method requires much more time than expected
experiment_1_purple_tea.lesson_learned: Tea extraction takes LONG time - cannot be rushed with acid

experiment_2_vegetable_oil_tea.title: Vegetable Oil Tea (THC Butter Style)
experiment_2_vegetable_oil_tea.hypothesis: DMT is non-polar (opposite of water), so oil should extract it like THC extracts into butter
experiment_2_vegetable_oil_tea.method: Made tea with vegetable oil similar to making marijuana butter
experiment_2_vegetable_oil_tea.reason: MHRB DMT is in acidic salt form naturally - doesn't extract into oil like THC does
experiment_2_vegetable_oil_tea.key_realization: Tea is actually the WORST method for extraction due to time requirements

experiment_3_limtek_to_oil.title: Limtek + Oil Extraction
experiment_3_limtek_to_oil.discovery: DMT must be BASIFIED first before oil extraction works
correct_procedure: Use Limtek process to basify the DMT (convert to freebase)
THEN add oil to extract the freebase
Oil pulls the non-polar freebase DMT effectively
experiment_3_limtek_to_oil.use_case: Making Ayahuasca cooking oil for culinary use
experiment_3_limtek_to_oil.assessment: One of the EASIEST extraction methods when goal is NOT pure crystals
experiment_3_limtek_to_oil.advantage: Good for making edible oil preparations

experiment_4_cold_water_extraction.title: Cold Water Extraction (Blig-Blug Method)

method.storage: Blig-blug recommends fridge, but sitting anywhere works

experiment_4_cold_water_extraction.key_insight: The extraction just takes TIME - that's the main factor
experiment_4_cold_water_extraction.advantage: Much easier than active extraction - just set and forget
experiment_4_cold_water_extraction.comparison: Easier to put mason jar in closet than to make tea or do limtek

experiment_5_straight_up_eating_it.title: Straight Up Eating It Tek
experiment_5_straight_up_eating_it.author: Angelicalist
experiment_5_straight_up_eating_it.discovery: Easiest method is NO EXTRACTION at all
experiment_5_straight_up_eating_it.assessment: SIMPLEST and most effective method for oral ayahuasca

step_1.action: Take Syrian Rue seeds like pills
step_1.method: Swallow whole with water - NO CHEWING

step_3.yogurt_type: Regular grocery store yogurt - even Walmart brand works

why_it_works.stomach_digestion: Stomach acid and digestion extract DMT naturally
why_it_works.yogurt_benefit: Masks taste, provides medium for consumption

by_complexity.simplest: Straight Up Eating It Tek (no extraction)

by_effectiveness_for_oral_use.tea: Works but takes very long time, easy to mess up
by_effectiveness_for_oral_use.oil_without_base: Does NOT work - DMT in salt form
by_effectiveness_for_oral_use.limtek_to_oil: Works well for cooking oil preparation

dmt_polarity.freebase_form: Non-polar - dissolves in oils and non-polar solvents

key_scientific_insights.why_butter_method_fails: MHRB DMT is in salt form, not freebase - won't extract into oil without basification
key_scientific_insights.why_cwe_works: Water slowly extracts the polar salt-form DMT over time
key_scientific_insights.why_eating_works: Stomach provides acid environment, digestion extracts DMT naturally

practical_recommendations.for_beginners: Start with Straight Up Eating It Tek - simplest and effective
practical_recommendations.for_cooking_oil: Use Limtek to basify, then extract with oil
practical_recommendations.for_tea_lovers: Use Cold Water Extraction - less work than boiling
practical_recommendations.avoid: Trying to extract into oil without basifying first
